name: Tanisha
greetingText: We really like your smile btw!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy birthdayyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy...
text2: That's what We were going to do.
text4: And realised, We wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell us if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
